text: Ali Eid (14 July 1940 - 25 December 2015) was a Lebanese politician. He was the leader of the Alawite Community. He founded the Arab Democratic Party in 1972 and until his death served as General Secretary of the Arab Democratic Party. He was born in Tripoli. On 25 December 2015, it was announced that Eid died in Damascus, Syria at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Lebanese Muslims Category:Lebanese politicians
title: Ali Eid
